<s> he seemed so anxious to be asked questions too that james felt he must be on his guard <\s>
<s> he began to suffer from his exertions for though wiry enough for a man of his long build he was seventy five years old <\s>
<s> he grew discouraged he seemed no nearer to anything had not obtained from his inspection any of the knowledge he had vaguely hoped for <\s>
<s> he had merely increased his dislike and mistrust of this young man who had tired him out with his politeness and in whose manner he now certainly detected mockery <\s>
<s> the fellow was sharper than he had thought and better looking than he had hoped <\s>
<s> he had a a don't care appearance that james to whom risk was the most intolerable thing in life did not appreciate a peculiar smile too coming when least expected and very queer eyes <\s>
<s> he reminded james as he said afterwards of a hungry cat <\s>
<s> this was as near as he could get in conversation with emily to a description of the peculiar exasperation velvetiness and mockery of which bosinney's manner had been composed <\s>
<s> at last having seen all that was to be seen he came out again at the door where he had gone in and now feeling that he was wasting time and strength and money all for nothing he took the courage of a forsyte in both hands and looking sharply at bosinney said i dare say you see a good deal of my daughter in law now what does she think of the house <\s>
<s> but she hasn't seen it i suppose <\s>
<s> this he said knowing all about irene's visit not of course that there was anything in the visit except that extraordinary remark she had made about not caring to get home' and the story of how june had taken the news <\s>
<s> he had determined by this way of putting the question to give bosinney a chance as he said to himself <\s>
<s> the latter was long in answering but kept his eyes with uncomfortable steadiness on james <\s>
<s> she has seen the house but i can't tell you what she thinks of it <\s>
<s> nervous and baffled james was constitutionally prevented from letting the matter drop <\s>
<s> he said she has seen it <\s>
<s> soames brought her down i suppose <\s>
<s> bosinney smilingly replied oh no <\s>
<s> what did she come down alone <\s>
<s> i really don't know whether i ought to tell you who brought her <\s>
<s> to james who knew that it was swithin this answer appeared incomprehensible <\s>
<s> he stammered you know that .... <\s>
<s> but he stopped suddenly perceiving his danger <\s>
<s> well he said if you don't want to tell me i suppose you won't <\s>
<s> nobody tells me anything <\s>
<s> somewhat to his surprise bosinney asked him a question <\s>
<s> by the by he said could you tell me if there are likely to be any more of you coming down <\s>
<s> i should like to be on the spot <\s>
<s> said james bewildered who should there be more <\s>
<s> i don't know of any more <\s>
<s> looking at the ground he held out his hand crossed the palm of it with bosinney's and taking his umbrella just above the silk walked away along the terrace <\s>
<s> before he turned the corner he glanced back and saw bosinney following him slowly 'slinking along the wall as he put it to himself like a great cat <\s>
<s> he paid no attention when the young fellow raised his hat <\s>
<s> outside the drive and out of sight he slackened his pace still more <\s>
<s> very slowly more bent than when he came lean hungry and disheartened he made his way back to the station <\s>
<s> the buccaneer watching him go so sadly home felt sorry perhaps for his behaviour to the old man <\s>
<s> chapter v soames and bosinney correspond james said nothing to his son of this visit to the house but having occasion to go to timothy's one morning on a matter connected with a drainage scheme which was being forced by the sanitary authorities on his brother he mentioned it there <\s>
<s> it was not he said a bad house <\s>
<s> he could see that a good deal could be made of it <\s>
<s> the fellow was clever in his way though what it was going to cost soames before it was done with he didn't know <\s>
<s> euphemia forsyte who happened to be in the room she had come round to borrow the rev <\s>
<s> scoles last novel passion and paregoric which was having such a vogue chimed in <\s>
<s> i saw irene yesterday at the stores she and mr <\s>
<s> bosinney were having a nice little chat in the groceries <\s>
<s> it was thus simply that she recorded a scene which had really made a deep and complicated impression on her <\s>
<s> she had been hurrying to the silk department of the church and commercial stores that institution than which with its admirable system admitting only guaranteed persons on a basis of payment before delivery no emporium can be more highly recommended to forsytes to match a piece of prunella silk for her mother who was waiting in the carriage outside <\s>
<s> passing through the groceries her eye was unpleasantly attracted by the back view of a very beautiful figure <\s>
<s> it was so charmingly proportioned so balanced and so well clothed that euphemia's instinctive propriety was at once alarmed such figures she knew by intuition rather than experience were rarely connected with virtue certainly never in her mind for her own back was somewhat difficult to fit <\s>
<s> her suspicions were fortunately confirmed <\s>
<s> a young man coming from the drugs had snatched off his hat and was accosting the lady with the unknown back <\s>
<s> it was then that she saw with whom she had to deal the lady was undoubtedly mrs <\s>
<s> soames the young man mr <\s>
<s> concealing herself rapidly over the purchase of a box of tunisian dates for she was impatient of awkwardly meeting people with parcels in her hands and at the busy time of the morning she was quite unintentionally an interested observer of their little interview <\s>
<s> soames usually somewhat pale had a delightful colour in her cheeks and mr <\s>
<s> bosinney's manner was strange though attractive she thought him rather a distinguished looking man and george's name for him the buccaneer' about which there was something romantic quite charming <\s>
<s> he seemed to be pleading <\s>
<s> indeed they talked so earnestly or rather he talked so earnestly for mrs <\s>
<s> soames did not say much that they caused inconsiderately an eddy in the traffic <\s>
<s> one nice old general going towards cigars was obliged to step quite out of the way and chancing to look up and see mrs <\s>
<s> soames face he actually took off his hat the old fool <\s>
<s> so like a man <\s>
<s> but it was mrs <\s>
<s> soames eyes that worried euphemia <\s>
<s> she never once looked at mr <\s>
<s> bosinney until he moved on and then she looked after him <\s>
<s> and oh that look <\s>
<s> on that look euphemia had spent much anxious thought <\s>
<s> it is not too much to say that it had hurt her with its dark lingering softness for all the world as though the woman wanted to drag him back and unsay something she had been saying <\s>
<s> ah well she had had no time to go deeply into the matter just then with that prunella silk on her hands but she was very intriguee' very <\s>
<s> she had just nodded to mrs <\s>
<s> soames to show her that she had seen and as she confided in talking it over afterwards to her chum francie roger's daughter didn't she look caught out just ... <\s>
<s> james most averse at the first blush to accepting any news confirmatory of his own poignant suspicions took her up at once <\s>
<s> oh he said they'd be after wall papers no doubt <\s>
<s> she said softly and taking passion and paregoric from the table added and so you'll lend me this dear auntie <\s>
<s> james left almost immediately after he was late as it was <\s>
<s> when he reached the office of forsyte bustard and forsyte he found soames sitting in his revolving chair drawing up a defence <\s>
<s> the latter greeted his father with a curt good morning and taking an envelope from his pocket said it may interest you to look through this <\s>
<s> james read as follows 309d sloane street may 15 dear forsyte the construction of your house being now completed my duties as architect have come to an end <\s>
<s> if i am to go on with the business of decoration which at your request i undertook i should like you to clearly understand that i must have a free hand <\s>
<s> you never come down without suggesting something that goes counter to my scheme <\s>
<s> i have here three letters from you each of which recommends an article i should never dream of putting in <\s>
<s> i had your father here yesterday afternoon who made further valuable suggestions <\s>
<s> please make up your mind therefore whether you want me to decorate for you or to retire which on the whole i should prefer to do <\s>
<s> but understand that if i decorate i decorate alone without interference of any sort <\s>
<s> if i do the thing i will do it thoroughly but i must have a free hand <\s>
<s> yours truly philip bosinney <\s>
<s> the exact and immediate cause of this letter cannot of course be told though it is not improbable that bosinney may have been moved by some sudden revolt against his position towards soames that eternal position of art towards property which is so admirably summed up on the back of the most indispensable of modern appliances in a sentence comparable to the very finest in tacitus thos <\s>
<s> what are you going to say to him <\s>
<s> soames did not even turn his head <\s>
<s> i haven't made up my mind he said and went on with his defence <\s>
<s> a client of his having put some buildings on a piece of ground that did not belong to him had been suddenly and most irritatingly warned to take them off again <\s>
<s> after carefully going into the facts however soames had seen his way to advise that his client had what was known as a title by possession and that though undoubtedly the ground did not belong to him he was entitled to keep it and had better do so and he was now following up this advice by taking steps to as the sailors say 'make it so <\s>
<s> he had a distinct reputation for sound advice people saying of him go to young forsyte a long headed fellow <\s>
<s> and he prized this reputation highly <\s>
<s> his natural taciturnity was in his favour nothing could be more calculated to give people especially people with property soames had no other clients the impression that he was a safe man <\s>
<s> and he was safe <\s>
<s> tradition habit education inherited aptitude native caution all joined to form a solid professional honesty superior to temptation from the very fact that it was built on an innate avoidance of risk <\s>
<s> how could he fall when his soul abhorred circumstances which render a fall possible a man cannot fall off the floor <\s>
<s> and those countless forsytes who in the course of innumerable transactions concerned with property of all sorts from wives to water rights had occasion for the services of a safe man found it both reposeful and profitable to confide in soames <\s>
<s> bosinney appeared determined that he should see everything and had not james been of too noticing a nature he would certainly have found himself going round the house a second time <\s>
<s> he seemed so anxious to be asked questions too that james felt he must be on his guard <\s>
<s> he began to suffer from his exertions for though wiry enough for a man of his long build he was seventy five years old <\s>
<s> he grew discouraged he seemed no nearer to anything had not obtained from his inspection any of the knowledge he had vaguely hoped for <\s>
<s> he had merely increased his dislike and mistrust of this young man who had tired him out with his politeness and in whose manner he now certainly detected mockery <\s>
<s> the fellow was sharper than he had thought and better looking than he had hoped <\s>
<s> he had a a don't care appearance that james to whom risk was the most intolerable thing in life did not appreciate a peculiar smile too coming when least expected and very queer eyes <\s>
<s> he reminded james as he said afterwards of a hungry cat <\s>
<s> this was as near as he could get in conversation with emily to a description of the peculiar exasperation velvetiness and mockery of which bosinney's manner had been composed <\s>

<s> soames to show her that she had seen and as she confided in talking it over afterwards to her chum francie roger's daughter didn't she look caught out just ... <\s>
<s> james most averse at the first blush to accepting any news confirmatory of his own poignant suspicions took her up at once <\s>
<s> oh he said they'd be after wall papers no doubt <\s>
<s> she said softly and taking passion and paregoric from the table added and so you'll lend me this dear auntie <\s>
<s> james left almost immediately after he was late as it was <\s>
<s> when he reached the office of forsyte bustard and forsyte he found soames sitting in his revolving chair drawing up a defence <\s>
<s> the latter greeted his father with a curt good morning and taking an envelope from his pocket said it may interest you to look through this <\s>
<s> james read as follows 309d sloane street may 15 dear forsyte the construction of your house being now completed my duties as architect have come to an end <\s>
<s> if i am to go on with the business of decoration which at your request i undertook i should like you to clearly understand that i must have a free hand <\s>
<s> you never come down without suggesting something that goes counter to my scheme <\s>
<s> i have here three letters from you each of which recommends an article i should never dream of putting in <\s>
<s> i had your father here yesterday afternoon who made further valuable suggestions <\s>
<s> please make up your mind therefore whether you want me to decorate for you or to retire which on the whole i should prefer to do <\s>
<s> but understand that if i decorate i decorate alone without interference of any sort <\s>
<s> if i do the thing i will do it thoroughly but i must have a free hand <\s>
<s> yours truly philip bosinney <\s>
<s> the exact and immediate cause of this letter cannot of course be told though it is not improbable that bosinney may have been moved by some sudden revolt against his position towards soames that eternal position of art towards property which is so admirably summed up on the back of the most indispensable of modern appliances in a sentence comparable to the very finest in tacitus thos <\s>
<s> what are you going to say to him <\s>
<s> soames did not even turn his head <\s>
<s> i haven't made up my mind he said and went on with his defence <\s>
<s> a client of his having put some buildings on a piece of ground that did not belong to him had been suddenly and most irritatingly warned to take them off again <\s>
<s> after carefully going into the facts however soames had seen his way to advise that his client had what was known as a title by possession and that though undoubtedly the ground did not belong to him he was entitled to keep it and had better do so and he was now following up this advice by taking steps to as the sailors say 'make it so <\s>
<s> he had a distinct reputation for sound advice people saying of him go to young forsyte a long headed fellow <\s>
<s> and he prized this reputation highly <\s>
<s> his natural taciturnity was in his favour nothing could be more calculated to give people especially people with property soames had no other clients the impression that he was a safe man <\s>
<s> and he was safe <\s>
<s> tradition habit education inherited aptitude native caution all joined to form a solid professional honesty superior to temptation from the very fact that it was built on an innate avoidance of risk <\s>
<s> how could he fall when his soul abhorred circumstances which render a fall possible a man cannot fall off the floor <\s>
<s> and those countless forsytes who in the course of innumerable transactions concerned with property of all sorts from wives to water rights had occasion for the services of a safe man found it both reposeful and profitable to confide in soames <\s>
<s> bosinney appeared determined that he should see everything and had not james been of too noticing a nature he would certainly have found himself going round the house a second time <\s>
<s> he seemed so anxious to be asked questions too that james felt he must be on his guard <\s>
<s> he began to suffer from his exertions for though wiry enough for a man of his long build he was seventy five years old <\s>
<s> he grew discouraged he seemed no nearer to anything had not obtained from his inspection any of the knowledge he had vaguely hoped for <\s>
<s> he had merely increased his dislike and mistrust of this young man who had tired him out with his politeness and in whose manner he now certainly detected mockery <\s>
<s> the fellow was sharper than he had thought and better looking than he had hoped <\s>
<s> he had a a don't care appearance that james to whom risk was the most intolerable thing in life did not appreciate a peculiar smile too coming when least expected and very queer eyes <\s>
<s> he reminded james as he said afterwards of a hungry cat <\s>
<s> this was as near as he could get in conversation with emily to a description of the peculiar exasperation velvetiness and mockery of which bosinney's manner had been composed <\s>
<s> at last having seen all that was to be seen he came out again at the door where he had gone in and now feeling that he was wasting time and strength and money all for nothing he took the courage of a forsyte in both hands and looking sharply at bosinney said i dare say you see a good deal of my daughter in law now what does she think of the house <\s>
<s> but she hasn't seen it i suppose <\s>
<s> this he said knowing all about irene's visit not of course that there was anything in the visit except that extraordinary remark she had made about not caring to get home' and the story of how june had taken the news <\s>
<s> he had determined by this way of putting the question to give bosinney a chance as he said to himself <\s>
<s> the latter was long in answering but kept his eyes with uncomfortable steadiness on james <\s>
<s> she has seen the house but i can't tell you what she thinks of it <\s>
<s> nervous and baffled james was constitutionally prevented from letting the matter drop <\s>
<s> he said she has seen it <\s>
<s> soames brought her down i suppose <\s>
<s> bosinney smilingly replied oh no <\s>
<s> what did she come down alone <\s>
<s> i really don't know whether i ought to tell you who brought her <\s>
<s> to james who knew that it was swithin this answer appeared incomprehensible <\s>
<s> he stammered you know that .... <\s>
<s> but he stopped suddenly perceiving his danger <\s>
<s> well he said if you don't want to tell me i suppose you won't <\s>
<s> nobody tells me anything <\s>
<s> somewhat to his surprise bosinney asked him a question <\s>
<s> by the by he said could you tell me if there are likely to be any more of you coming down <\s>
<s> i should like to be on the spot <\s>
<s> said james bewildered who should there be more <\s>
<s> i don't know of any more <\s>
<s> looking at the ground he held out his hand crossed the palm of it with bosinney's and taking his umbrella just above the silk walked away along the terrace <\s>
<s> before he turned the corner he glanced back and saw bosinney following him slowly 'slinking along the wall as he put it to himself like a great cat <\s>
<s> he paid no attention when the young fellow raised his hat <\s>
<s> outside the drive and out of sight he slackened his pace still more <\s>
<s> very slowly more bent than when he came lean hungry and disheartened he made his way back to the station <\s>
<s> the buccaneer watching him go so sadly home felt sorry perhaps for his behaviour to the old man <\s>
<s> chapter v soames and bosinney correspond james said nothing to his son of this visit to the house but having occasion to go to timothy's one morning on a matter connected with a drainage scheme which was being forced by the sanitary authorities on his brother he mentioned it there <\s>
<s> it was not he said a bad house <\s>
<s> he could see that a good deal could be made of it <\s>
<s> the fellow was clever in his way though what it was going to cost soames before it was done with he didn't know <\s>
<s> euphemia forsyte who happened to be in the room she had come round to borrow the rev <\s>
<s> scoles last novel passion and paregoric which was having such a vogue chimed in <\s>
<s> i saw irene yesterday at the stores she and mr <\s>
<s> bosinney were having a nice little chat in the groceries <\s>
<s> it was thus simply that she recorded a scene which had really made a deep and complicated impression on her <\s>
<s> she had been hurrying to the silk department of the church and commercial stores that institution than which with its admirable system admitting only guaranteed persons on a basis of payment before delivery no emporium can be more highly recommended to forsytes to match a piece of prunella silk for her mother who was waiting in the carriage outside <\s>
<s> passing through the groceries her eye was unpleasantly attracted by the back view of a very beautiful figure <\s>
<s> it was so charmingly proportioned so balanced and so well clothed that euphemia's instinctive propriety was at once alarmed such figures she knew by intuition rather than experience were rarely connected with virtue certainly never in her mind for her own back was somewhat difficult to fit <\s>
<s> her suspicions were fortunately confirmed <\s>
<s> a young man coming from the drugs had snatched off his hat and was accosting the lady with the unknown back <\s>
<s> it was then that she saw with whom she had to deal the lady was undoubtedly mrs <\s>
<s> soames the young man mr <\s>
<s> concealing herself rapidly over the purchase of a box of tunisian dates for she was impatient of awkwardly meeting people with parcels in her hands and at the busy time of the morning she was quite unintentionally an interested observer of their little interview <\s>
<s> soames usually somewhat pale had a delightful colour in her cheeks and mr <\s>
<s> bosinney's manner was strange though attractive she thought him rather a distinguished looking man and george's name for him the buccaneer' about which there was something romantic quite charming <\s>
<s> he seemed to be pleading <\s>
<s> indeed they talked so earnestly or rather he talked so earnestly for mrs <\s>
<s> soames did not say much that they caused inconsiderately an eddy in the traffic <\s>
<s> one nice old general going towards cigars was obliged to step quite out of the way and chancing to look up and see mrs <\s>
<s> soames face he actually took off his hat the old fool <\s>
<s> so like a man <\s>
<s> but it was mrs <\s>
<s> soames eyes that worried euphemia <\s>
<s> she never once looked at mr <\s>
<s> bosinney until he moved on and then she looked after him <\s>
<s> and oh that look <\s>
<s> on that look euphemia had spent much anxious thought <\s>
<s> it is not too much to say that it had hurt her with its dark lingering softness for all the world as though the woman wanted to drag him back and unsay something she had been saying <\s>
<s> ah well she had had no time to go deeply into the matter just then with that prunella silk on her hands but she was very intriguee' very <\s>
<s> she had just nodded to mrs <\s>
<s> soames to show her that she had seen and as she confided in talking it over afterwards to her chum francie roger's daughter didn't she look caught out just ... <\s>
<s> james most averse at the first blush to accepting any news confirmatory of his own poignant suspicions took her up at once <\s>
<s> oh he said they'd be after wall papers no doubt <\s>
<s> she said softly and taking passion and paregoric from the table added and so you'll lend me this dear auntie <\s>

<s> chapter v soames and bosinney correspond james said nothing to his son of this visit to the house but having occasion to go to timothy's one morning on a matter connected with a drainage scheme which was being forced by the sanitary authorities on his brother he mentioned it there <\s>
<s> it was not he said a bad house <\s>
<s> he could see that a good deal could be made of it <\s>
<s> the fellow was clever in his way though what it was going to cost soames before it was done with he didn't know <\s>
<s> euphemia forsyte who happened to be in the room she had come round to borrow the rev <\s>
<s> scoles last novel passion and paregoric which was having such a vogue chimed in <\s>
<s> i saw irene yesterday at the stores she and mr <\s>
<s> bosinney were having a nice little chat in the groceries <\s>
<s> it was thus simply that she recorded a scene which had really made a deep and complicated impression on her <\s>
<s> she had been hurrying to the silk department of the church and commercial stores that institution than which with its admirable system admitting only guaranteed persons on a basis of payment before delivery no emporium can be more highly recommended to forsytes to match a piece of prunella silk for her mother who was waiting in the carriage outside <\s>
<s> passing through the groceries her eye was unpleasantly attracted by the back view of a very beautiful figure <\s>
<s> it was so charmingly proportioned so balanced and so well clothed that euphemia's instinctive propriety was at once alarmed such figures she knew by intuition rather than experience were rarely connected with virtue certainly never in her mind for her own back was somewhat difficult to fit <\s>
<s> her suspicions were fortunately confirmed <\s>
<s> a young man coming from the drugs had snatched off his hat and was accosting the lady with the unknown back <\s>
<s> it was then that she saw with whom she had to deal the lady was undoubtedly mrs <\s>
<s> soames the young man mr <\s>
<s> concealing herself rapidly over the purchase of a box of tunisian dates for she was impatient of awkwardly meeting people with parcels in her hands and at the busy time of the morning she was quite unintentionally an interested observer of their little interview <\s>
<s> soames usually somewhat pale had a delightful colour in her cheeks and mr <\s>
<s> bosinney's manner was strange though attractive she thought him rather a distinguished looking man and george's name for him the buccaneer' about which there was something romantic quite charming <\s>
<s> he seemed to be pleading <\s>
<s> indeed they talked so earnestly or rather he talked so earnestly for mrs <\s>
<s> soames did not say much that they caused inconsiderately an eddy in the traffic <\s>
<s> one nice old general going towards cigars was obliged to step quite out of the way and chancing to look up and see mrs <\s>
<s> soames face he actually took off his hat the old fool <\s>
<s> so like a man <\s>
<s> but it was mrs <\s>
<s> soames eyes that worried euphemia <\s>
<s> she never once looked at mr <\s>
<s> bosinney until he moved on and then she looked after him <\s>
<s> and oh that look <\s>
<s> on that look euphemia had spent much anxious thought <\s>
<s> it is not too much to say that it had hurt her with its dark lingering softness for all the world as though the woman wanted to drag him back and unsay something she had been saying <\s>
<s> ah well she had had no time to go deeply into the matter just then with that prunella silk on her hands but she was very intriguee' very <\s>
<s> she had just nodded to mrs <\s>
<s> soames to show her that she had seen and as she confided in talking it over afterwards to her chum francie roger's daughter didn't she look caught out just ... <\s>
<s> james most averse at the first blush to accepting any news confirmatory of his own poignant suspicions took her up at once <\s>
<s> oh he said they'd be after wall papers no doubt <\s>
<s> she said softly and taking passion and paregoric from the table added and so you'll lend me this dear auntie <\s>
<s> james left almost immediately after he was late as it was <\s>
<s> when he reached the office of forsyte bustard and forsyte he found soames sitting in his revolving chair drawing up a defence <\s>
<s> the latter greeted his father with a curt good morning and taking an envelope from his pocket said it may interest you to look through this <\s>
<s> james read as follows 309d sloane street may 15 dear forsyte the construction of your house being now completed my duties as architect have come to an end <\s>
<s> if i am to go on with the business of decoration which at your request i undertook i should like you to clearly understand that i must have a free hand <\s>
<s> you never come down without suggesting something that goes counter to my scheme <\s>
<s> i have here three letters from you each of which recommends an article i should never dream of putting in <\s>
<s> i had your father here yesterday afternoon who made further valuable suggestions <\s>
<s> please make up your mind therefore whether you want me to decorate for you or to retire which on the whole i should prefer to do <\s>
<s> but understand that if i decorate i decorate alone without interference of any sort <\s>
<s> if i do the thing i will do it thoroughly but i must have a free hand <\s>
<s> yours truly philip bosinney <\s>
<s> the exact and immediate cause of this letter cannot of course be told though it is not improbable that bosinney may have been moved by some sudden revolt against his position towards soames that eternal position of art towards property which is so admirably summed up on the back of the most indispensable of modern appliances in a sentence comparable to the very finest in tacitus thos <\s>
<s> what are you going to say to him <\s>
<s> soames did not even turn his head <\s>
<s> i haven't made up my mind he said and went on with his defence <\s>
<s> a client of his having put some buildings on a piece of ground that did not belong to him had been suddenly and most irritatingly warned to take them off again <\s>
<s> after carefully going into the facts however soames had seen his way to advise that his client had what was known as a title by possession and that though undoubtedly the ground did not belong to him he was entitled to keep it and had better do so and he was now following up this advice by taking steps to as the sailors say 'make it so <\s>
<s> he had a distinct reputation for sound advice people saying of him go to young forsyte a long headed fellow <\s>
<s> and he prized this reputation highly <\s>
<s> his natural taciturnity was in his favour nothing could be more calculated to give people especially people with property soames had no other clients the impression that he was a safe man <\s>
<s> and he was safe <\s>
<s> tradition habit education inherited aptitude native caution all joined to form a solid professional honesty superior to temptation from the very fact that it was built on an innate avoidance of risk <\s>
<s> how could he fall when his soul abhorred circumstances which render a fall possible a man cannot fall off the floor <\s>
<s> and those countless forsytes who in the course of innumerable transactions concerned with property of all sorts from wives to water rights had occasion for the services of a safe man found it both reposeful and profitable to confide in soames <\s>
<s> bosinney appeared determined that he should see everything and had not james been of too noticing a nature he would certainly have found himself going round the house a second time <\s>
<s> he seemed so anxious to be asked questions too that james felt he must be on his guard <\s>
<s> he began to suffer from his exertions for though wiry enough for a man of his long build he was seventy five years old <\s>
<s> he grew discouraged he seemed no nearer to anything had not obtained from his inspection any of the knowledge he had vaguely hoped for <\s>
<s> he had merely increased his dislike and mistrust of this young man who had tired him out with his politeness and in whose manner he now certainly detected mockery <\s>
<s> the fellow was sharper than he had thought and better looking than he had hoped <\s>
<s> he had a a don't care appearance that james to whom risk was the most intolerable thing in life did not appreciate a peculiar smile too coming when least expected and very queer eyes <\s>
<s> he reminded james as he said afterwards of a hungry cat <\s>
<s> this was as near as he could get in conversation with emily to a description of the peculiar exasperation velvetiness and mockery of which bosinney's manner had been composed <\s>
<s> at last having seen all that was to be seen he came out again at the door where he had gone in and now feeling that he was wasting time and strength and money all for nothing he took the courage of a forsyte in both hands and looking sharply at bosinney said i dare say you see a good deal of my daughter in law now what does she think of the house <\s>
<s> but she hasn't seen it i suppose <\s>
<s> this he said knowing all about irene's visit not of course that there was anything in the visit except that extraordinary remark she had made about not caring to get home' and the story of how june had taken the news <\s>
<s> he had determined by this way of putting the question to give bosinney a chance as he said to himself <\s>
<s> the latter was long in answering but kept his eyes with uncomfortable steadiness on james <\s>
<s> she has seen the house but i can't tell you what she thinks of it <\s>
<s> nervous and baffled james was constitutionally prevented from letting the matter drop <\s>
<s> he said she has seen it <\s>
<s> soames brought her down i suppose <\s>
<s> bosinney smilingly replied oh no <\s>
<s> what did she come down alone <\s>
<s> i really don't know whether i ought to tell you who brought her <\s>
<s> to james who knew that it was swithin this answer appeared incomprehensible <\s>
<s> he stammered you know that .... <\s>
<s> but he stopped suddenly perceiving his danger <\s>
<s> well he said if you don't want to tell me i suppose you won't <\s>
<s> nobody tells me anything <\s>
<s> somewhat to his surprise bosinney asked him a question <\s>
<s> by the by he said could you tell me if there are likely to be any more of you coming down <\s>
<s> i should like to be on the spot <\s>
<s> said james bewildered who should there be more <\s>
<s> i don't know of any more <\s>
<s> looking at the ground he held out his hand crossed the palm of it with bosinney's and taking his umbrella just above the silk walked away along the terrace <\s>
<s> before he turned the corner he glanced back and saw bosinney following him slowly 'slinking along the wall as he put it to himself like a great cat <\s>
<s> he paid no attention when the young fellow raised his hat <\s>
<s> outside the drive and out of sight he slackened his pace still more <\s>
<s> very slowly more bent than when he came lean hungry and disheartened he made his way back to the station <\s>
<s> the buccaneer watching him go so sadly home felt sorry perhaps for his behaviour to the old man <\s>

<s> he seemed so anxious to be asked questions too that james felt he must be on his guard <\s>
<s> he began to suffer from his exertions for though wiry enough for a man of his long build he was seventy five years old <\s>
<s> he grew discouraged he seemed no nearer to anything had not obtained from his inspection any of the knowledge he had vaguely hoped for <\s>
<s> he had merely increased his dislike and mistrust of this young man who had tired him out with his politeness and in whose manner he now certainly detected mockery <\s>
<s> the fellow was sharper than he had thought and better looking than he had hoped <\s>
<s> he had a a don't care appearance that james to whom risk was the most intolerable thing in life did not appreciate a peculiar smile too coming when least expected and very queer eyes <\s>
<s> he reminded james as he said afterwards of a hungry cat <\s>
<s> this was as near as he could get in conversation with emily to a description of the peculiar exasperation velvetiness and mockery of which bosinney's manner had been composed <\s>
<s> at last having seen all that was to be seen he came out again at the door where he had gone in and now feeling that he was wasting time and strength and money all for nothing he took the courage of a forsyte in both hands and looking sharply at bosinney said i dare say you see a good deal of my daughter in law now what does she think of the house <\s>
<s> but she hasn't seen it i suppose <\s>
<s> this he said knowing all about irene's visit not of course that there was anything in the visit except that extraordinary remark she had made about not caring to get home' and the story of how june had taken the news <\s>
<s> he had determined by this way of putting the question to give bosinney a chance as he said to himself <\s>
<s> the latter was long in answering but kept his eyes with uncomfortable steadiness on james <\s>
<s> she has seen the house but i can't tell you what she thinks of it <\s>
<s> nervous and baffled james was constitutionally prevented from letting the matter drop <\s>
<s> he said she has seen it <\s>
<s> soames brought her down i suppose <\s>
<s> bosinney smilingly replied oh no <\s>
<s> what did she come down alone <\s>
<s> i really don't know whether i ought to tell you who brought her <\s>
<s> to james who knew that it was swithin this answer appeared incomprehensible <\s>
<s> he stammered you know that .... <\s>
<s> but he stopped suddenly perceiving his danger <\s>
<s> well he said if you don't want to tell me i suppose you won't <\s>
<s> nobody tells me anything <\s>
<s> somewhat to his surprise bosinney asked him a question <\s>
<s> by the by he said could you tell me if there are likely to be any more of you coming down <\s>
<s> i should like to be on the spot <\s>
<s> said james bewildered who should there be more <\s>
<s> i don't know of any more <\s>
<s> looking at the ground he held out his hand crossed the palm of it with bosinney's and taking his umbrella just above the silk walked away along the terrace <\s>
<s> before he turned the corner he glanced back and saw bosinney following him slowly 'slinking along the wall as he put it to himself like a great cat <\s>
<s> he paid no attention when the young fellow raised his hat <\s>
<s> outside the drive and out of sight he slackened his pace still more <\s>
<s> very slowly more bent than when he came lean hungry and disheartened he made his way back to the station <\s>
<s> the buccaneer watching him go so sadly home felt sorry perhaps for his behaviour to the old man <\s>
<s> chapter v soames and bosinney correspond james said nothing to his son of this visit to the house but having occasion to go to timothy's one morning on a matter connected with a drainage scheme which was being forced by the sanitary authorities on his brother he mentioned it there <\s>
<s> it was not he said a bad house <\s>
<s> he could see that a good deal could be made of it <\s>
<s> the fellow was clever in his way though what it was going to cost soames before it was done with he didn't know <\s>
<s> euphemia forsyte who happened to be in the room she had come round to borrow the rev <\s>
<s> scoles last novel passion and paregoric which was having such a vogue chimed in <\s>
<s> i saw irene yesterday at the stores she and mr <\s>
<s> bosinney were having a nice little chat in the groceries <\s>
<s> it was thus simply that she recorded a scene which had really made a deep and complicated impression on her <\s>
<s> she had been hurrying to the silk department of the church and commercial stores that institution than which with its admirable system admitting only guaranteed persons on a basis of payment before delivery no emporium can be more highly recommended to forsytes to match a piece of prunella silk for her mother who was waiting in the carriage outside <\s>
<s> passing through the groceries her eye was unpleasantly attracted by the back view of a very beautiful figure <\s>
<s> it was so charmingly proportioned so balanced and so well clothed that euphemia's instinctive propriety was at once alarmed such figures she knew by intuition rather than experience were rarely connected with virtue certainly never in her mind for her own back was somewhat difficult to fit <\s>
<s> her suspicions were fortunately confirmed <\s>
<s> a young man coming from the drugs had snatched off his hat and was accosting the lady with the unknown back <\s>
<s> it was then that she saw with whom she had to deal the lady was undoubtedly mrs <\s>
<s> soames the young man mr <\s>
<s> concealing herself rapidly over the purchase of a box of tunisian dates for she was impatient of awkwardly meeting people with parcels in her hands and at the busy time of the morning she was quite unintentionally an interested observer of their little interview <\s>
<s> soames usually somewhat pale had a delightful colour in her cheeks and mr <\s>
<s> bosinney's manner was strange though attractive she thought him rather a distinguished looking man and george's name for him the buccaneer' about which there was something romantic quite charming <\s>
<s> he seemed to be pleading <\s>
<s> indeed they talked so earnestly or rather he talked so earnestly for mrs <\s>
<s> soames did not say much that they caused inconsiderately an eddy in the traffic <\s>
<s> one nice old general going towards cigars was obliged to step quite out of the way and chancing to look up and see mrs <\s>
<s> soames face he actually took off his hat the old fool <\s>
<s> so like a man <\s>
<s> but it was mrs <\s>
<s> soames eyes that worried euphemia <\s>
<s> she never once looked at mr <\s>
<s> bosinney until he moved on and then she looked after him <\s>
<s> and oh that look <\s>
<s> on that look euphemia had spent much anxious thought <\s>
<s> it is not too much to say that it had hurt her with its dark lingering softness for all the world as though the woman wanted to drag him back and unsay something she had been saying <\s>
<s> ah well she had had no time to go deeply into the matter just then with that prunella silk on her hands but she was very intriguee' very <\s>
<s> she had just nodded to mrs <\s>
<s> soames to show her that she had seen and as she confided in talking it over afterwards to her chum francie roger's daughter didn't she look caught out just ... <\s>
<s> james most averse at the first blush to accepting any news confirmatory of his own poignant suspicions took her up at once <\s>
<s> oh he said they'd be after wall papers no doubt <\s>
<s> she said softly and taking passion and paregoric from the table added and so you'll lend me this dear auntie <\s>
<s> james left almost immediately after he was late as it was <\s>
<s> when he reached the office of forsyte bustard and forsyte he found soames sitting in his revolving chair drawing up a defence <\s>
<s> the latter greeted his father with a curt good morning and taking an envelope from his pocket said it may interest you to look through this <\s>
<s> james read as follows 309d sloane street may 15 dear forsyte the construction of your house being now completed my duties as architect have come to an end <\s>
<s> if i am to go on with the business of decoration which at your request i undertook i should like you to clearly understand that i must have a free hand <\s>
<s> you never come down without suggesting something that goes counter to my scheme <\s>
<s> i have here three letters from you each of which recommends an article i should never dream of putting in <\s>
<s> i had your father here yesterday afternoon who made further valuable suggestions <\s>
<s> please make up your mind therefore whether you want me to decorate for you or to retire which on the whole i should prefer to do <\s>
<s> but understand that if i decorate i decorate alone without interference of any sort <\s>
<s> if i do the thing i will do it thoroughly but i must have a free hand <\s>
<s> yours truly philip bosinney <\s>
<s> the exact and immediate cause of this letter cannot of course be told though it is not improbable that bosinney may have been moved by some sudden revolt against his position towards soames that eternal position of art towards property which is so admirably summed up on the back of the most indispensable of modern appliances in a sentence comparable to the very finest in tacitus thos <\s>
<s> what are you going to say to him <\s>
<s> soames did not even turn his head <\s>
<s> i haven't made up my mind he said and went on with his defence <\s>
<s> a client of his having put some buildings on a piece of ground that did not belong to him had been suddenly and most irritatingly warned to take them off again <\s>
<s> after carefully going into the facts however soames had seen his way to advise that his client had what was known as a title by possession and that though undoubtedly the ground did not belong to him he was entitled to keep it and had better do so and he was now following up this advice by taking steps to as the sailors say 'make it so <\s>
<s> he had a distinct reputation for sound advice people saying of him go to young forsyte a long headed fellow <\s>
<s> and he prized this reputation highly <\s>
<s> his natural taciturnity was in his favour nothing could be more calculated to give people especially people with property soames had no other clients the impression that he was a safe man <\s>
<s> and he was safe <\s>
<s> tradition habit education inherited aptitude native caution all joined to form a solid professional honesty superior to temptation from the very fact that it was built on an innate avoidance of risk <\s>
<s> how could he fall when his soul abhorred circumstances which render a fall possible a man cannot fall off the floor <\s>
<s> and those countless forsytes who in the course of innumerable transactions concerned with property of all sorts from wives to water rights had occasion for the services of a safe man found it both reposeful and profitable to confide in soames <\s>
<s> bosinney appeared determined that he should see everything and had not james been of too noticing a nature he would certainly have found himself going round the house a second time <\s>
<s> he seemed so anxious to be asked questions too that james felt he must be on his guard <\s>
<s> he began to suffer from his exertions for though wiry enough for a man of his long build he was seventy five years old <\s>
<s> he grew discouraged he seemed no nearer to anything had not obtained from his inspection any of the knowledge he had vaguely hoped for <\s>
<s> he had merely increased his dislike and mistrust of this young man who had tired him out with his politeness and in whose manner he now certainly detected mockery <\s>
<s> the fellow was sharper than he had thought and better looking than he had hoped <\s>
<s> he had a a don't care appearance that james to whom risk was the most intolerable thing in life did not appreciate a peculiar smile too coming when least expected and very queer eyes <\s>
<s> he reminded james as he said afterwards of a hungry cat <\s>
<s> this was as near as he could get in conversation with emily to a description of the peculiar exasperation velvetiness and mockery of which bosinney's manner had been composed <\s>

<s> soames to show her that she had seen and as she confided in talking it over afterwards to her chum francie roger's daughter didn't she look caught out just ... <\s>
<s> james most averse at the first blush to accepting any news confirmatory of his own poignant suspicions took her up at once <\s>
<s> oh he said they'd be after wall papers no doubt <\s>
<s> she said softly and taking passion and paregoric from the table added and so you'll lend me this dear auntie <\s>
<s> james left almost immediately after he was late as it was <\s>
<s> when he reached the office of forsyte bustard and forsyte he found soames sitting in his revolving chair drawing up a defence <\s>
<s> the latter greeted his father with a curt good morning and taking an envelope from his pocket said it may interest you to look through this <\s>
<s> james read as follows 309d sloane street may 15 dear forsyte the construction of your house being now completed my duties as architect have come to an end <\s>
<s> if i am to go on with the business of decoration which at your request i undertook i should like you to clearly understand that i must have a free hand <\s>
<s> you never come down without suggesting something that goes counter to my scheme <\s>
<s> i have here three letters from you each of which recommends an article i should never dream of putting in <\s>
<s> i had your father here yesterday afternoon who made further valuable suggestions <\s>
<s> please make up your mind therefore whether you want me to decorate for you or to retire which on the whole i should prefer to do <\s>
<s> but understand that if i decorate i decorate alone without interference of any sort <\s>
<s> if i do the thing i will do it thoroughly but i must have a free hand <\s>
<s> yours truly philip bosinney <\s>
<s> the exact and immediate cause of this letter cannot of course be told though it is not improbable that bosinney may have been moved by some sudden revolt against his position towards soames that eternal position of art towards property which is so admirably summed up on the back of the most indispensable of modern appliances in a sentence comparable to the very finest in tacitus thos <\s>
<s> what are you going to say to him <\s>
<s> soames did not even turn his head <\s>
<s> i haven't made up my mind he said and went on with his defence <\s>
<s> a client of his having put some buildings on a piece of ground that did not belong to him had been suddenly and most irritatingly warned to take them off again <\s>
<s> after carefully going into the facts however soames had seen his way to advise that his client had what was known as a title by possession and that though undoubtedly the ground did not belong to him he was entitled to keep it and had better do so and he was now following up this advice by taking steps to as the sailors say 'make it so <\s>
<s> he had a distinct reputation for sound advice people saying of him go to young forsyte a long headed fellow <\s>
<s> and he prized this reputation highly <\s>
<s> his natural taciturnity was in his favour nothing could be more calculated to give people especially people with property soames had no other clients the impression that he was a safe man <\s>
<s> and he was safe <\s>
<s> tradition habit education inherited aptitude native caution all joined to form a solid professional honesty superior to temptation from the very fact that it was built on an innate avoidance of risk <\s>
<s> how could he fall when his soul abhorred circumstances which render a fall possible a man cannot fall off the floor <\s>
<s> and those countless forsytes who in the course of innumerable transactions concerned with property of all sorts from wives to water rights had occasion for the services of a safe man found it both reposeful and profitable to confide in soames <\s>
<s> bosinney appeared determined that he should see everything and had not james been of too noticing a nature he would certainly have found himself going round the house a second time <\s>
<s> he seemed so anxious to be asked questions too that james felt he must be on his guard <\s>
<s> he began to suffer from his exertions for though wiry enough for a man of his long build he was seventy five years old <\s>
<s> he grew discouraged he seemed no nearer to anything had not obtained from his inspection any of the knowledge he had vaguely hoped for <\s>
<s> he had merely increased his dislike and mistrust of this young man who had tired him out with his politeness and in whose manner he now certainly detected mockery <\s>
<s> the fellow was sharper than he had thought and better looking than he had hoped <\s>
<s> he had a a don't care appearance that james to whom risk was the most intolerable thing in life did not appreciate a peculiar smile too coming when least expected and very queer eyes <\s>
<s> he reminded james as he said afterwards of a hungry cat <\s>
<s> this was as near as he could get in conversation with emily to a description of the peculiar exasperation velvetiness and mockery of which bosinney's manner had been composed <\s>
<s> at last having seen all that was to be seen he came out again at the door where he had gone in and now feeling that he was wasting time and strength and money all for nothing he took the courage of a forsyte in both hands and looking sharply at bosinney said i dare say you see a good deal of my daughter in law now what does she think of the house <\s>
<s> but she hasn't seen it i suppose <\s>
<s> this he said knowing all about irene's visit not of course that there was anything in the visit except that extraordinary remark she had made about not caring to get home' and the story of how june had taken the news <\s>
<s> he had determined by this way of putting the question to give bosinney a chance as he said to himself <\s>
<s> the latter was long in answering but kept his eyes with uncomfortable steadiness on james <\s>
<s> she has seen the house but i can't tell you what she thinks of it <\s>
<s> nervous and baffled james was constitutionally prevented from letting the matter drop <\s>
<s> he said she has seen it <\s>
<s> soames brought her down i suppose <\s>
<s> bosinney smilingly replied oh no <\s>
<s> what did she come down alone <\s>
<s> i really don't know whether i ought to tell you who brought her <\s>
<s> to james who knew that it was swithin this answer appeared incomprehensible <\s>
<s> he stammered you know that .... <\s>
<s> but he stopped suddenly perceiving his danger <\s>
<s> well he said if you don't want to tell me i suppose you won't <\s>
<s> nobody tells me anything <\s>
<s> somewhat to his surprise bosinney asked him a question <\s>
<s> by the by he said could you tell me if there are likely to be any more of you coming down <\s>
<s> i should like to be on the spot <\s>
<s> said james bewildered who should there be more <\s>
<s> i don't know of any more <\s>
<s> looking at the ground he held out his hand crossed the palm of it with bosinney's and taking his umbrella just above the silk walked away along the terrace <\s>
<s> before he turned the corner he glanced back and saw bosinney following him slowly 'slinking along the wall as he put it to himself like a great cat <\s>
<s> he paid no attention when the young fellow raised his hat <\s>
<s> outside the drive and out of sight he slackened his pace still more <\s>
<s> very slowly more bent than when he came lean hungry and disheartened he made his way back to the station <\s>
<s> the buccaneer watching him go so sadly home felt sorry perhaps for his behaviour to the old man <\s>
<s> chapter v soames and bosinney correspond james said nothing to his son of this visit to the house but having occasion to go to timothy's one morning on a matter connected with a drainage scheme which was being forced by the sanitary authorities on his brother he mentioned it there <\s>
<s> it was not he said a bad house <\s>
<s> he could see that a good deal could be made of it <\s>
<s> the fellow was clever in his way though what it was going to cost soames before it was done with he didn't know <\s>
<s> euphemia forsyte who happened to be in the room she had come round to borrow the rev <\s>
<s> scoles last novel passion and paregoric which was having such a vogue chimed in <\s>
<s> i saw irene yesterday at the stores she and mr <\s>
<s> bosinney were having a nice little chat in the groceries <\s>
<s> it was thus simply that she recorded a scene which had really made a deep and complicated impression on her <\s>
<s> she had been hurrying to the silk department of the church and commercial stores that institution than which with its admirable system admitting only guaranteed persons on a basis of payment before delivery no emporium can be more highly recommended to forsytes to match a piece of prunella silk for her mother who was waiting in the carriage outside <\s>
<s> passing through the groceries her eye was unpleasantly attracted by the back view of a very beautiful figure <\s>
<s> it was so charmingly proportioned so balanced and so well clothed that euphemia's instinctive propriety was at once alarmed such figures she knew by intuition rather than experience were rarely connected with virtue certainly never in her mind for her own back was somewhat difficult to fit <\s>
<s> her suspicions were fortunately confirmed <\s>
<s> a young man coming from the drugs had snatched off his hat and was accosting the lady with the unknown back <\s>
<s> it was then that she saw with whom she had to deal the lady was undoubtedly mrs <\s>
<s> soames the young man mr <\s>
<s> concealing herself rapidly over the purchase of a box of tunisian dates for she was impatient of awkwardly meeting people with parcels in her hands and at the busy time of the morning she was quite unintentionally an interested observer of their little interview <\s>
<s> soames usually somewhat pale had a delightful colour in her cheeks and mr <\s>
<s> bosinney's manner was strange though attractive she thought him rather a distinguished looking man and george's name for him the buccaneer' about which there was something romantic quite charming <\s>
<s> he seemed to be pleading <\s>
<s> indeed they talked so earnestly or rather he talked so earnestly for mrs <\s>
<s> soames did not say much that they caused inconsiderately an eddy in the traffic <\s>
<s> one nice old general going towards cigars was obliged to step quite out of the way and chancing to look up and see mrs <\s>
<s> soames face he actually took off his hat the old fool <\s>
<s> so like a man <\s>
<s> but it was mrs <\s>
<s> soames eyes that worried euphemia <\s>
<s> she never once looked at mr <\s>
<s> bosinney until he moved on and then she looked after him <\s>
<s> and oh that look <\s>
<s> on that look euphemia had spent much anxious thought <\s>
<s> it is not too much to say that it had hurt her with its dark lingering softness for all the world as though the woman wanted to drag him back and unsay something she had been saying <\s>
<s> ah well she had had no time to go deeply into the matter just then with that prunella silk on her hands but she was very intriguee' very <\s>
<s> she had just nodded to mrs <\s>
<s> soames to show her that she had seen and as she confided in talking it over afterwards to her chum francie roger's daughter didn't she look caught out just ... <\s>
<s> james most averse at the first blush to accepting any news confirmatory of his own poignant suspicions took her up at once <\s>
<s> oh he said they'd be after wall papers no doubt <\s>
<s> she said softly and taking passion and paregoric from the table added and so you'll lend me this dear auntie <\s>

<s> chapter v soames and bosinney correspond james said nothing to his son of this visit to the house but having occasion to go to timothy's one morning on a matter connected with a drainage scheme which was being forced by the sanitary authorities on his brother he mentioned it there <\s>
<s> it was not he said a bad house <\s>
<s> he could see that a good deal could be made of it <\s>
<s> the fellow was clever in his way though what it was going to cost soames before it was done with he didn't know <\s>
<s> euphemia forsyte who happened to be in the room she had come round to borrow the rev <\s>
<s> scoles last novel passion and paregoric which was having such a vogue chimed in <\s>
<s> i saw irene yesterday at the stores she and mr <\s>
<s> bosinney were having a nice little chat in the groceries <\s>
<s> it was thus simply that she recorded a scene which had really made a deep and complicated impression on her <\s>
<s> she had been hurrying to the silk department of the church and commercial stores that institution than which with its admirable system admitting only guaranteed persons on a basis of payment before delivery no emporium can be more highly recommended to forsytes to match a piece of prunella silk for her mother who was waiting in the carriage outside <\s>
<s> passing through the groceries her eye was unpleasantly attracted by the back view of a very beautiful figure <\s>
<s> it was so charmingly proportioned so balanced and so well clothed that euphemia's instinctive propriety was at once alarmed such figures she knew by intuition rather than experience were rarely connected with virtue certainly never in her mind for her own back was somewhat difficult to fit <\s>
<s> her suspicions were fortunately confirmed <\s>
<s> a young man coming from the drugs had snatched off his hat and was accosting the lady with the unknown back <\s>
<s> it was then that she saw with whom she had to deal the lady was undoubtedly mrs <\s>
<s> soames the young man mr <\s>
<s> concealing herself rapidly over the purchase of a box of tunisian dates for she was impatient of awkwardly meeting people with parcels in her hands and at the busy time of the morning she was quite unintentionally an interested observer of their little interview <\s>
<s> soames usually somewhat pale had a delightful colour in her cheeks and mr <\s>
<s> bosinney's manner was strange though attractive she thought him rather a distinguished looking man and george's name for him the buccaneer' about which there was something romantic quite charming <\s>
<s> he seemed to be pleading <\s>
<s> indeed they talked so earnestly or rather he talked so earnestly for mrs <\s>
<s> soames did not say much that they caused inconsiderately an eddy in the traffic <\s>
<s> one nice old general going towards cigars was obliged to step quite out of the way and chancing to look up and see mrs <\s>
<s> soames face he actually took off his hat the old fool <\s>
<s> so like a man <\s>
<s> but it was mrs <\s>
<s> soames eyes that worried euphemia <\s>
<s> she never once looked at mr <\s>
<s> bosinney until he moved on and then she looked after him <\s>
<s> and oh that look <\s>
<s> on that look euphemia had spent much anxious thought <\s>
<s> it is not too much to say that it had hurt her with its dark lingering softness for all the world as though the woman wanted to drag him back and unsay something she had been saying <\s>
<s> ah well she had had no time to go deeply into the matter just then with that prunella silk on her hands but she was very intriguee' very <\s>
<s> she had just nodded to mrs <\s>
<s> soames to show her that she had seen and as she confided in talking it over afterwards to her chum francie roger's daughter didn't she look caught out just ... <\s>
<s> james most averse at the first blush to accepting any news confirmatory of his own poignant suspicions took her up at once <\s>
<s> oh he said they'd be after wall papers no doubt <\s>
<s> she said softly and taking passion and paregoric from the table added and so you'll lend me this dear auntie <\s>
<s> james left almost immediately after he was late as it was <\s>
<s> when he reached the office of forsyte bustard and forsyte he found soames sitting in his revolving chair drawing up a defence <\s>
<s> the latter greeted his father with a curt good morning and taking an envelope from his pocket said it may interest you to look through this <\s>
<s> james read as follows 309d sloane street may 15 dear forsyte the construction of your house being now completed my duties as architect have come to an end <\s>
<s> if i am to go on with the business of decoration which at your request i undertook i should like you to clearly understand that i must have a free hand <\s>
<s> you never come down without suggesting something that goes counter to my scheme <\s>
<s> i have here three letters from you each of which recommends an article i should never dream of putting in <\s>
<s> i had your father here yesterday afternoon who made further valuable suggestions <\s>
<s> please make up your mind therefore whether you want me to decorate for you or to retire which on the whole i should prefer to do <\s>
<s> but understand that if i decorate i decorate alone without interference of any sort <\s>
<s> if i do the thing i will do it thoroughly but i must have a free hand <\s>
<s> yours truly philip bosinney <\s>
<s> the exact and immediate cause of this letter cannot of course be told though it is not improbable that bosinney may have been moved by some sudden revolt against his position towards soames that eternal position of art towards property which is so admirably summed up on the back of the most indispensable of modern appliances in a sentence comparable to the very finest in tacitus thos <\s>
<s> what are you going to say to him <\s>
<s> soames did not even turn his head <\s>
<s> i haven't made up my mind he said and went on with his defence <\s>
<s> a client of his having put some buildings on a piece of ground that did not belong to him had been suddenly and most irritatingly warned to take them off again <\s>
<s> after carefully going into the facts however soames had seen his way to advise that his client had what was known as a title by possession and that though undoubtedly the ground did not belong to him he was entitled to keep it and had better do so and he was now following up this advice by taking steps to as the sailors say 'make it so <\s>
<s> he had a distinct reputation for sound advice people saying of him go to young forsyte a long headed fellow <\s>
<s> and he prized this reputation highly <\s>
<s> his natural taciturnity was in his favour nothing could be more calculated to give people especially people with property soames had no other clients the impression that he was a safe man <\s>
<s> and he was safe <\s>
<s> tradition habit education inherited aptitude native caution all joined to form a solid professional honesty superior to temptation from the very fact that it was built on an innate avoidance of risk <\s>
<s> how could he fall when his soul abhorred circumstances which render a fall possible a man cannot fall off the floor <\s>
<s> and those countless forsytes who in the course of innumerable transactions concerned with property of all sorts from wives to water rights had occasion for the services of a safe man found it both reposeful and profitable to confide in soames <\s>
<s> bosinney appeared determined that he should see everything and had not james been of too noticing a nature he would certainly have found himself going round the house a second time <\s>
<s> he seemed so anxious to be asked questions too that james felt he must be on his guard <\s>
<s> he began to suffer from his exertions for though wiry enough for a man of his long build he was seventy five years old <\s>
<s> he grew discouraged he seemed no nearer to anything had not obtained from his inspection any of the knowledge he had vaguely hoped for <\s>
<s> he had merely increased his dislike and mistrust of this young man who had tired him out with his politeness and in whose manner he now certainly detected mockery <\s>
<s> the fellow was sharper than he had thought and better looking than he had hoped <\s>
<s> he had a a don't care appearance that james to whom risk was the most intolerable thing in life did not appreciate a peculiar smile too coming when least expected and very queer eyes <\s>
<s> he reminded james as he said afterwards of a hungry cat <\s>
<s> this was as near as he could get in conversation with emily to a description of the peculiar exasperation velvetiness and mockery of which bosinney's manner had been composed <\s>
<s> at last having seen all that was to be seen he came out again at the door where he had gone in and now feeling that he was wasting time and strength and money all for nothing he took the courage of a forsyte in both hands and looking sharply at bosinney said i dare say you see a good deal of my daughter in law now what does she think of the house <\s>
<s> but she hasn't seen it i suppose <\s>
<s> this he said knowing all about irene's visit not of course that there was anything in the visit except that extraordinary remark she had made about not caring to get home' and the story of how june had taken the news <\s>
<s> he had determined by this way of putting the question to give bosinney a chance as he said to himself <\s>
<s> the latter was long in answering but kept his eyes with uncomfortable steadiness on james <\s>
<s> she has seen the house but i can't tell you what she thinks of it <\s>
<s> nervous and baffled james was constitutionally prevented from letting the matter drop <\s>
<s> he said she has seen it <\s>
<s> soames brought her down i suppose <\s>
<s> bosinney smilingly replied oh no <\s>
<s> what did she come down alone <\s>
<s> i really don't know whether i ought to tell you who brought her <\s>
<s> to james who knew that it was swithin this answer appeared incomprehensible <\s>
<s> he stammered you know that .... <\s>
<s> but he stopped suddenly perceiving his danger <\s>
<s> well he said if you don't want to tell me i suppose you won't <\s>
<s> nobody tells me anything <\s>
<s> somewhat to his surprise bosinney asked him a question <\s>
<s> by the by he said could you tell me if there are likely to be any more of you coming down <\s>
<s> i should like to be on the spot <\s>
<s> said james bewildered who should there be more <\s>
<s> i don't know of any more <\s>
<s> looking at the ground he held out his hand crossed the palm of it with bosinney's and taking his umbrella just above the silk walked away along the terrace <\s>
<s> before he turned the corner he glanced back and saw bosinney following him slowly 'slinking along the wall as he put it to himself like a great cat <\s>
<s> he paid no attention when the young fellow raised his hat <\s>
<s> outside the drive and out of sight he slackened his pace still more <\s>
<s> very slowly more bent than when he came lean hungry and disheartened he made his way back to the station <\s>
<s> the buccaneer watching him go so sadly home felt sorry perhaps for his behaviour to the old man <\s>
